name: JfrogCli
description: Run your own JFrog CLI command.
author: JFrog

inputs.name: artifactoryService
inputs.label: Artifactory service
inputs.helpMarkDown: Artifactory service to run the command against.

inputs.name: useCustomVersion
inputs.label: Use custom JFrog CLI version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to use a specific JFrog CLI version.

inputs.name: cliVersion
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify the version of JFrog CLI to use.
You can also set $(jfrogCliVersion).

inputs.name: command
inputs.label: Command to run
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set your JFrog CLI command after 'jfrog rt '. There is no need to provide the URL, the credentials or the server ID options.

validation.message: The command must start with `jfrog rt `.
